subject: Looking for reviewers for an upcoming book on testing
msgSnippet: Hi everyone, We are currently looking for reviewers for an upcoming book focused on Java testing. The book will cover a lot of different aspects of testing,
messageBody:
Hi everyone,

We are currently looking for reviewers for an upcoming book focused on Java
testing.

The book will cover a lot of different aspects of testing, among which:

- Unit, system, functional, etc...
- Performance
- Data-driven
- Multi-thread
- Enterprise (JNDI, JDBC, EJB3, JTA, JAX-WS, JMS, etc...)
- Web
- Spring
- Mocking
- Coverage
- Dependency injection
- Graphical
- etc...

Please drop me an email (don't forget to remove the mailing-list from the
CC's) if you're interested in reviewing it, or even just chapters. Please
also include your motivation for reviewing this book in a few lines.

Thanks!
--
Cédric


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
